SELECT A.TRMN_AMNNO ,A.MWMN_NA_TRPL_C ,A.SRA_MWMNNM ,A.FRLNO ,A.ZIP ,A.DONGUP ,A.DONGBW ,A.OHSE_TELNO ,A.CUS_MPNO ,A.MACO_YN ,A.JRDWO_DSC ,A.PSN_INF_OFR_AGR_YN ,A.TMS_YN ,A.DEL_YN ,A.RMK_CNTN ,A.SMS_NO , CASE WHEN B.TRMN_AMNNO IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE '1' END AS BAD_TRMN_AMNNO FROM TB_LA_IS_MM_MWMN A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MH_BAD_TRMN B ON A.SRA_MWMNNM = B.SRA_MWMNNM AND A.FRLNO = B.FRLNO WHERE A.NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND A.DEL_YN = '0'
AND (A.TRMN_AMNNO = #{sra_mwmnnm} or #{sra_mwmnnm} is null)
AND A.SRA_MWMNNM LIKE '%' || #{sra_mwmnnm} || '%'
